targets.query: SELECT distinct("percent_Uptime") FROM "uptime" WHERE ("modemName" = 'Modem 0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("percent_Uptime") FROM "uptime" WHERE ("modemName" = 'Modem 1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.name: Modem_0
list.query: SELECT interfaceName, "duration"  FROM  uptime where modemName='Modem 0'

list.name: IPaddr_0
list.query: select  "ipaddr" from uptime where modemName='Modem 0' GROUP BY * ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1

list.name: Modem_1
list.query: SELECT interfaceName, "duration"  FROM  uptime where modemName='Modem 1'

list.name: IPaddr_1
list.query: select  "ipaddr" from uptime where modemName='Modem 1' GROUP BY * ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1
